mapper.insert: insert into t_student_sign (id, student_id, teacher_id, class_id, lab_id, begin_year, end_year, term, week, week_days, class_num, work_date, computer_no, status, create_date ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teacherId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{beginYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{endYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{term,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{week,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{weekDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{classNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{computerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update t_student_sign
student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
teacher_id = #{teacherId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lab_id = #{labId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
begin_year = #{beginYear,jdbcType=INTEGER},
end_year = #{endYear,jdbcType=INTEGER},
term = #{term,jdbcType=INTEGER},
week = #{week,jdbcType=INTEGER},
week_days = #{weekDays,jdbcType=INTEGER},
class_num = #{classNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
work_date = #{workDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
computer_no = #{computerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_student_sign set student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teacher_id = #{teacherId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lab_id = #{labId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, begin_year = #{beginYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, end_year = #{endYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, term = #{term,jdbcType=INTEGER}, week = #{week,jdbcType=INTEGER}, week_days = #{weekDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, class_num = #{classNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_date = #{workDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, computer_no = #{computerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select tss.student_id as student_id,ts.student_name as student_name,ts.class_no as class_no,ts.major_in as major_in, ts.college as college,ts.grade_no as grade_no,tss.status as status,tss.computer_no as computer_no,tl.lab_name as lab_name from t_student_sign as tss JOIN t_student as ts JOIN t_lab as tl where tss.class_id= #{classId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND tss.week= #{week,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND tss.teacher_id= #{teacherId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND tss.student_id = ts.student_id AND tss.lab_id=tl.id
